title: i got the poro icon but not the kayle with the skin
body: i know riot is busy doing this for everyone but when you promise it plz just post something that you are running late or something because i rlly want the skin

replies.body:
We're not running late, we're simply sending these out in waves to ensure they're getting out properly, due to the sheer amount of players getting gifted.

Let me know if you don't have them by the 23rd.
